de.tud.plt.r43ples.revisionTree

Class Tree

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.plt.r43ples.revisionTree.Tree

  • public class Tree
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a tree structure to store revision structure.

        public void addNode(java.lang.String revisionNumber,
           java.lang.String revisionUri,
           java.lang.String fullGraph)
        Add new node to tree.
        Parameters:
        revisionNumber - revision number
        revisionUri - URI which specifies this revision
        fullGraph - URI of the graph which holds a full copy if available

      • addEdgeNode

        Add new node to tree or extend old node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to create or change
        predecessor - the predecessor to add

      • getPathToRevision

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getPathToRevision(java.lang.String revisionNumber)
        Calculate the path from specified revision to a referenced revision.
        Parameters:
        revisionNumber - the revision number to calculate the path for
        Returns:
        linked list with all revisions from specified revision number to referenced revision
